page.title: 02LOCAL INDUSTRY
page.content: In the East,farming is still an important and successful industry;the rich soils sustaining a healthy mixed farming industry based on sheep and cattle and the growing of wheat,barley and potatoes and,especially with E.E.C. encouragement,the growing of cash lucrative crops such as rape. Market gardening concerns operate on the edge of the city. The area to the west of this block portrays evidence of Leicester's industrial importance based on the old industries of hosiery,light engineering and printing.Newer industries have sprung up,located in small industrial trading estates. Barkby Thorpe Road is an important industrial area and smaller ones are located on the Melton Road and in Thurmaston.Two large firms here are Thorn Lighting and Parker Plant.
